Posts.Content: heartbroken08 wrote: I had it have an inter uterine. Biopsy cause had some light bleeding and staining. Stopped tamoxifen 4 yrs ago- at my yearly check up with/ oncologisthi said one usually u get staining or Bleeding while on tamoxifen not 4 years after you have stopped so bit nervous about that.Anyone else have feedback on that thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone who is post tamoxifen -4 yrs heartbroken08 pupmom

Posts.Content: heartbroken08 wrote: I had a biopsy on a finding in my right Breast. Awaiting results. Same breast that's had stage est+ starting the ninth year - took tamoxifen for5 yrs and Had radiation. I guess I thought I would just go on and on - if it is malignant -radiologist Same one as 9 yrs ago -says 50- 50 chance-last time she was right on the $ - said it definitely Looked like cancer- it was So I was stage one lumpectomy and tamoxifen for 5 yrs and followed with Mammaos and mris. So I wonder if there is a reoccurrence in same breast do they do mastectomy? if that were so- I would really opt for both. Any feedback. I see my surgeon ( who I just happened to have. Check up appt in 4 days. Should have results by then - Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: heartbroken08 wrote: I had a REOCCURENCE in the same breast after 9 yrs - they want to do a mastectomy on that side and I think why wait for it to happen to the left side. I'm not braca Took tamoxifen 5 yrs and rads. I am 72 yrs old - I think I am too old to go through this. is there anyone who is older who went through this. Thanks Log in to post a reply
